General.Name: Shandong New Beiyang Information Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong New Beiyang Information Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of thermal printing, automatic control and identification, and smart system integration products in China. The company offers receipt, label, kiosk, and portable printers; document and kiosk scanners; scanning and printing all-in-one machine; teller cash recyclers, banknote sorting machine, smart teller machine, and user cash recycler; single and bunch note validator and cash deposit machine and terminal; kiosk check scanning module; and small telescopic machine, cross belt sorting machine, swing wheel, sorting cabinet, stack separation, and singulator. Further, it provides parcel, self pick-up, and food pick-up locker, and temperature-controlled locker; and vending machines. It serves banking, logistics, retail automation and other industries. The company also exports its products to various countries and regions in Europe, North America, and the Asia-Pacific. Shandong New Beiyang Information Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Weihai, China.

1.Name: Mr. Bo  Rong
1.Title: CFO, Deputy GM, Sec. of Board & Director
